text: The Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana is an institution that publishes a biographical dictionary, the Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, Catalogo Generale Artisti dal Novecento ad oggi, started in 2012 and completed in 2022. ==Volumes== * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.1, by Alberto Moioli, 2012.Opac Sbn, Enciclopedia d'arte italiana: catalogo generale artisti dal Novecento ad oggi, 2012. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.2, by Alberto Moioli, 2013. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.3, by Alberto Moioli, 2014. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.4, by Alberto Moioli, 2015.Opac Sbn, Enciclopedia d'arte italiana: catalogo generale artisti dal Novecento ad oggi, 2015. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.5, by Alberto Moioli, 2016.. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.6, by Alberto Moioli, 2017.. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.7, by Alberto Moioli, 2018.Opac Sbn, Enciclopedia d'arte italiana: catalogo generale artisti dal Novecento ad oggi, 2018. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.8, by Alberto Moioli, 2019. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.9, by Alberto Moioli, 2020.. * Enciclopedia d’Arte Italiana, General catalog of artists from 900 to today, n.9 (bis) by Alberto Moioli, 2021.. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Dictionaries Category:Art
title: Enciclopedia d'arte italiana
